patterns: tell me the format of world cup
how is world cup played,what is world cup 2022
responses: It is the football event comes every other 4 year, where around the world complete. each team of 4 is distributed in 8 groups plays in their respective Groups, top 2 qualify, then Knockout round starts of last-16. 16 team plays and winner head to Quatar final and winner goes to Semi final and winner plays Final and Winner is Crown champion of the world.

patterns: what was the total prize pool for the world cup 2022
2022 world cup prize pool compare to the previous tournament
was the price pool has an increament in price increase in price pool

What was the total prize pool for the world cup,the 2022 world cup prize pool compare to the previous tournament,how much did the champions of  receive,much money did the runners-up up receive,prizepool of runner up
much did the team in third place at the receive
team in fourth place at the  receive
each team in the quarter-finals (5th–8th place) of the receive,much did each team in the group stage (17th–32nd place) of the 2022 World Cup receive?
the total prize  distributed among the 32 teams
responses:
FIFA announced the prizes for the 2022 World Cup in April 2022.
Each qualified team for the 2022 World Cup received $1.5 million before the competition to cover preparation costs.Each team participating in the 2022 World Cup received at least $9 million in prize money.
Each qualified team for the 2022 World Cup received $1.5 million before the competition to cover preparation costs.Each team participating in the 2022 World Cup received at least $9 million in prize money.
The total prize pool for the 2022 World Cup was $440 million. The prize pool for the 2022 World Cup was $40 million greater than the prize pool of the previous tournament.
The total prize pool for the 2022 World Cup was $440 million. The prize pool for the 2022 World Cup was $40 million greater than the prize pool of the previous tournament.
The champions of the 2022 World Cup received $42 million.
The runners-up of the 2022 World Cup received $30 million.
The team in third place at the 2022 World Cup received $27 million.
The team in fourth place at the 2022 World Cup received $25 million.
Each team in the quarter-finals (5th–8th place) of the 2022 World Cup received $17 million.
Each team in the group stage (17th–32nd place) of the 2022 World Cup received $9 million.
The total prize of $440 million was distributed among the 32 teams with varying amounts depending on their final standing in the tournament, ranging from $9 million for group stage teams to $42 million for the champions.

patterns: When was the tournament's official mascot unveiled and what is its name?
responses: The official mascot of the tournament is La'eeb. La'eeb is an Arabic word meaning super-skilled player

patterns: why was the 2022 FIFA World Cup not held in June and July as usual?,Why was there a change in an event of World Cup 2022?held in winter of November and December,Which month was World Cup event was oranganised? schedule change,
responses: The 2022 FIFA World Cup was not held in June and July, as is typical, due to Qatar's intense summer heat and high humidity. Instead, it was played in November and December.
